text: allāhuvinṟe mārgattil taṅṅaḷuṭe dhanaṁ celavaḻikkukayuṁ enniṭṭatine tuṭarnn‌, celav ceytat eṭuttupaṟayukayēā śalyappeṭuttukayēā ceyyātirikkukayuṁ ceyyunnavar ārēā avarkk taṅṅaḷuṭe rakṣitāviṅkal avar arhikkunna pratiphalamuṇṭāyirikkuṁ. avarkk yāteānnuṁ bhayappeṭēṇṭatilla. avar duḥkhikkēṇṭi varikayumilla
